2. Give you angry looks - No, I wouldn't do that. It's important to communicate in a respectful and constructive way.
3. Put down your friends - No, I wouldn't do that. It's important to treat others with kindness and respect.
4. Say things to scare you - No, I wouldn't do that. It's not appropriate to try to scare or intimidate someone.
5. Make you do something embarrassing - No, I wouldn't do that. It's important to respect your boundaries and comfort level.
6. Encourage you to open up - Yes, I would do that. It's important to create a safe and supportive environment for open communication.
7. Open to your ideas - Yes, I would be open to hearing and considering your ideas. It's important to listen to and value each other's perspectives.
8. Excited to see you - Yes, I would be excited to see you. It's important to prioritize spending quality time together and nurturing our relationship.
9. Listen attentively to you - Yes, I would listen attentively to you. It's important to actively listen and show respect for each other's thoughts and feelings.
10. Make an effort with your family - Yes, I would make an effort with your family. It's important to prioritize building positive relationships with the people who are important to you.
